00031 
00035 #define Enable_adc()                         (ADCSRA |= (1<<ADEN))
00037 
00041 #define Right_adjust_adc_result()            (ADMUX  &= ~(1<<ADLAR))
00042 #define Left_adjust_adc_result()             (ADMUX  |=  (1<<ADLAR))
00044 
00048 #define Enable_adc_high_speed_mode()         (ADCSRB |=  (1<<ADHSM))
00049 #define Disable_adc_high_speed_mode()        (ADCSRB &= ~(1<<ADHSM))
00051 
00052 
00056 #define Enable_internal_vref()               (ADMUX  |=  ((1<<REFS1)|(1<<REFS0)) )
00057 #define Enable_external_vref()               (ADMUX  &= ~((1<<REFS1)|(1<<REFS0)) )
00058 #define Enable_vcc_vref()                    (ADMUX  &= ~(1<<REFS1),          \
00059                                               ADMUX  |=  (1<<REFS0) )
00061 
00065 #define Enable_all_it()                      (SREG   |=  (0x80) )
00066 #define Disable_all_it()                     (SREG   &= ~(0x80) )
00067 #define Enable_adc_it()                      (ADCSRA |=  (1<<ADIE) )
00068 #define Disable_adc_it()                     (ADCSRA &= ~(1<<ADIE) )
00069 #define Clear_adc_flag()                     (ADCSRA &=  (1<<ADIF) )
00071 
00075 #define Set_prescaler(prescaler)             (ADCSRA &= ~((1<<ADPS2)|(1<<ADPS1)|(1<<ADPS0)),\
00076                                               ADCSRA |=  (prescaler) )
00078 
00082 #define Clear_adc_mux()                      (ADMUX  &= ~((1<<MUX3)|(1<<MUX2)|(1<<MUX1)|(1<<MUX0)) )
00083 #define Select_adc_channel(channel)          (Clear_adc_mux(), ADMUX |= (channel) )
00085 
00089 
00093 #define Start_conv()                          (ADCSRA |= (1<<ADSC) )
00094 #define Start_conv_channel(channel)           (Select_adc_channel(channel), Start_conv() )
00095 #define Start_amplified_conv()                (ADCSRB |= (1<<ADASCR) )
00096 #define Stop_amplified_conv()                 (ADCSRB &= ~(1<<ADASCR) )
00097 #define Start_amplified_conv_channel(channel) (Select_adc_channel(channel), Start_amplified_conv() )
00099 
00103 #define Start_conv_idle()                    (SMCR   |=  (1<<SM0)|(1<<SE) )
00104 #define Start_conv_idle_channel(channel)     (Select_adc_channel(channel), Start_conv_idle() )
00105 #define Clear_sleep_mode()                   (SMCR   &= ~(1<<SM0)|(1<<SE) )
00107 
00109 
00113 #define Adc_get_8_bits_result()               ((U8)(ADCH))
00114 #define Adc_get_10_bits_result()              ((U16)(ADCL+((U16)(ADCH<<8))))
00116 
00117 
00121 #define Disable_adc()                        (ADCSRA &= ~(1<<ADEN))
00123 
00127 #define Is_adc_conv_finished()               ((ADCSRA &  (1<<ADIF)) ? TRUE : FALSE)
00128 #define Is_adc_conv_not_finished()           ((ADCSRA | ~(1<<ADIF)) ? TRUE : FALSE)
